sameAnalysis.part_name: 这些名词均含有"产品，制品"之意。
means: manufacture ： 一般指机器大量制造的产品。
produce ： 多指农产品(尤指蔬菜水果等)。
product ： 一般指工业产品，也可泛指各种各样的产品。
production ： 含义广泛，不同场合有不同的意思，可表示"产品，产物"，尤指人类智力或艺术劳动的产品。

sentence.Network_en: A series of technical foul-ups delayed the launch of the new product.
sentence.Network_cn: 一系列技术问题延误了新产品的上市。

sentence.Network_en: Editorially, they never really became a unique distinct product.
sentence.Network_cn: 就立场和观点来说，它们从未真正做到树立起自己独具一格的视角。

sentence.Network_en: As the domestic market becomes saturated, firms begin to export the product.
sentence.Network_cn: 由于国内市场饱和，各公司开始外销。

PerfectNetExp.abs: ◆ 广义产品(Generalized Product)，使用的是基于ISO9000:2000《质量管理系统————基础和术语》(Quality Management System Standards —— Fundamentals and vocabulary)3.4.1“过程(process)“定义和2.4.2“产品(product)“定义的哲理级抽象概念：一组将输入转化为输出的相互关联或相互作用的活动的结果.一些典型的广义产品实例.
广西华美纸业集团有限公司 ... 走进华美 ABOUT US 产品展示 PRODUCTS 华美新闻 NEWS.
北京京驰无限通信技术有限公司 ... 关于我们 ABOUT US 产品中心 PRODUCTS 服务支持 SUPPORT.
丽磁音响有限公司 ... About us 公司概况 Products 产品介绍 News 丽磁资讯.

项目管理术语英汉对照表 - MBA智库百科 ... Product User 产品用户 Production 生产 Production Capacity 生产能力.
广告制作( Production) 根据与客户签订的合作制作日期，由MAGIC MEDIA向巴士公司调配相关车辆至制作工厂，通过制作人员专业 …
英语词根词缀记忆大全 ... productive a 生产的；多产的 productivity n 生产力，生产活动 reduce v 降低，减少.
商务英语词汇大全_外语教育网 ... 货币供应 money supply 生产率 productivity 劳动力 labor force.

derivation.yuyuan_name: late Middle English (as a mathematical term): from Latin productum 'something produced', neuter past participle (used as a noun) of producere 'bring forth' (see produce)

encyclopedia.content: 一、基本词义 名词 n. [C] 1. 产品，产物；产量；出产 They came here in search of new markets for their products. 他们来此为他们的产品寻找新市场。 2. 结果，成果 The plan was the product of many days of careful thought. 这个计划是许多天仔细考虑的成果。 3. 作品，创作 4. 【数】锛埑孙級积 20 is the product of 5 and 4. 二十是五与四的乘积。 5. 【化】锛埢Х从Φ娘級生成物二、网络释义 网络释义 product 1.

entry.def: A product is something that is produced and sold in large quantities, often as a result of a manufacturing process.

example.ex: Try to get the best product at the lowest price...
example.tran: 尽量以最低的价格买到最好的产品。

example.ex: South Korea's imports of consumer products jumped 33% in this year.
example.tran: 今年，韩国消费产品的进口激增了33%。

entry.def: If you say that someone or something is a product of a situation or process, you mean that the situation or process has had a significant effect in making them what they are.

example.ex: We are all products of our time...
example.tran: 我们都是这个时代的产物。

example.ex: The bank is the product of a 1971 merger of two Japanese banks.
example.tran: 这家银行是由两家日本银行于1971年合并而成。

sentences.sentence: "good business depends on having good merchandise"
"that store offers a variety of products"

means.word_mean: 2. an artifact that has been created by someone or some process;

sentences.sentence: "they export most of their agricultural production"

means.word_mean: 3. a consequence of someone's efforts or of a particular set of circumstances;

sentences.sentence: "skill is the product of hours of practice"
"his reaction was the product of hunger and fatigue"

means.word_mean: 4. a chemical substance formed as a result of a chemical reaction;

sentences.sentence: "a product of lime and nitric acid"

means.word_mean: 6. the set of elements common to two or more sets;

sentences.sentence: "the set of red hats is the intersection of the set of hats and the set of red things"

stems_affixes.value_cn: 演绎,推论;扣除,减去,扣除额
stems_affixes.word_buile: deduce[v.[from]演绎,推断,推论]+tion表名词→n.演绎,推论;扣除,减去,扣除额
induce[v.引诱,劝使;引起,导致;感应]+ment具体物→n.引诱物
pro向前+duce引导,带来→引向前→生产
produce的名词化→生产出的东西
de向下+duce引导,带来→向下引→推论

stems_affixes.value_cn: 引诱,劝使;引起,导致;感应
stems_affixes.word_buile: in进入+duce引导,带来→引进去→诱导

stems_affixes.value_cn: 生产,制造,显示,演出,导致
stems_affixes.word_buile: pro向前+duce引导,带来→引向前→生产
re回+duce引导,带来→往回引→减少
tra横+duce引导,带来→向横引→不正→诽谤

Sentence.sentence: The official unemployment rate is the product of a telephone survey of about 60000 homes
Being equipped with one of the most recent cutting-edge IT products could just help a college or university foster a cutting-edge reputation.

sentences.en: My bike is a home product.
Today's housing problems are the product of years of neglect.
sentences.cn: 今天的住房困难是多年来忽视的结果。
